name: Nuclear Winter
description:
Made for #GBJAM 5

Nuclear Winter is a game about surviving in a hostile environment with dangerous snowstorms and collecting gems. Survive as long as possible and grab that highscore!

That was my second game jam, and the first for our team. Because of schedule issues we had to put most of our work in a single week end and we're really proud of how it came out. We had tons of fun making this and hope you will have as much fun playing it!

Made with Unity3D

Programming

  • Theo M (@Theoremnd)
  • Laurent F (@bluecodelf)

Art

  • Camille S (@k10x10x10)

Sounds and music

  • River S (Soundcloud/RedBlueJ)
